bug.short_desc: Input HTML Tag does not support space character

long_desc.thetext:
When using Input HTML Element in "qx.ui.embed.Html", it does not support space character. When pressing space, nothing happens. The space character is not produced. The space character is not inserted into the input field.
Same issue on textareas.
Every other character is supported. Even "new line" (hitting Enter key) is supported on textareas.
More weird: Pressing "cmd" + "space" (or "ctrl" + "space", don`t remember) inserts a space character / white character.
This issue was tested on Mac 10.8.3 with Chrome, Firefox and Safari, all latest versions. Windows 7 with Firefox. Same issue on all browsers.
I also tried closing the input element, placing properties like size or type etc. Still the same issue.
See minimal playground application:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/playground/#%7B%22code%22%3A%22%252F%252F%2520Create%2520Html%250Avar%2520html%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.embed.Html%28%29%253B%250Ahtml.setHtml%28%2522%253Cinput%253E%2522%29%253B%250A%250A%252F%252F%2520Document%2520is%2520the%2520application%2520root%250Avar%2520doc%2520%253D%2520this.getRoot%28%29%253B%250A%250A%252F%252F%2520Add%2520button%2520to%2520document%2520at%2520fixed%2520coordinates%250Adoc.add%28html%252C%250A%257B%250A%2520%2520left%2520%253A%2520100%252C%250A%2520%2520top%2520%2520%253A%252050%250A%257D%29%253B%250A%22%2C%20%22mode%22%3A%22ria%22%7D
